Town Council & Council Meeting Packet
=====================================

Regular Meetings
----------------

* 6 p.m.
* 2nd and 4th Tuesdays of every month, and open to the public
* The Town Council meetings will be hybrid. They will be held in-person in Upper Maple Center, 104 Commercial St and via livestream, unless otherwise noted on the Agenda. Please view the Calendar on the homepage for livestream information.

Residents and interested parties can address the Town Council during the Community Comments portion of the agenda.

Agendas & Minutes

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://www.townoflaconner.org/AgendaCenter/Town-Council-2).

Members
-------

### Contact Information

The following mailing address and phone number apply to all members:

Address:  
P.O. Box 400  
La Conner, WA 98257

Phone number:  
360-466-3125

Council Committees
------------------

Annie Taylor - Long Range Planning/Technology, Utilities, WAB, Arts Commission

Ivan Carlson - Facilities, Park & Port

Rick Dole - Communication, Finance, Flood Control/Emergency Management, Long Range Planning/Technology, Streets & Safety

MaryLee Chamberlain - Communication, Facilities, Streets & Safety, Ombudsman

Mary Wohleb - Finance, Park & Port, Utilities
